 The Amazing Spider-Man 2 takes place outside the events of the 2nd
 film in a unique story where Spider-Man discovers a larger threat to
 NYC that has turned the underworld upside down. Villains from the 
 film and classic Marvel characters come together in a twisted web of
 adrenaline-fueled, web-slinging action.

  1. Extract release
  2. Mount ISO

  Notes: Game is updated to the latest version. The official "Bundle"
         includes base game plus DLCs listed below:
 
         - Amazing Spider-Man 2 - Iron Spider 
         - Amazing Spider-Man 2 - Cosmic Spider-Man
         - Amazing Spider-Man 2 - Black Suit
         - Amazing Spider-Man 2 - Spider-Man Noir
         - Amazing Spider-Man 2 - Electro-Proof
         - Amazing Spider-Man 2 - Ends of the Earth
